title: Microsoft's turnaround netted CEO Satya Nadella $18.3 million this year
text:
Microsoft's turnaround netted CEO Satya Nadella $18.3 million this year 
Published By: Neowin.net - Today 
A result of Microsoft's strong showing since he took over, Microsoft's CEO Satya Nadella has been granted a total of over $18.3 million in c...
